sources.title: ClinicalTrials.gov API - Clinical Studies Database
sources.description: Comprehensive database of clinical studies conducted around the world

sources.title: MIMIC-III Clinical Database
sources.description: Deidentified health data from 40,000+ ICU patients at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center

sources.title: MIMIC-IV Clinical Database
sources.description: Updated version with data from 65,000+ ICU patients and 200,000+ emergency department patients

sources.description: Comprehensive global health statistics and indicators from WHO

sources.title: WHO Life Expectancy Data
sources.description: Global life expectancy statistics by country and demographic

sources.title: WHO Athena API - Global Health Data
sources.description: WHO's comprehensive health data API with multiple endpoints

sources.title: WHO Data Collections Portal
sources.description: Central repository for WHO's health data collections and datasets

sources.description: CDC health content and educational materials

sources.description: Comprehensive biomedical literature database

sources.description: Medical device adverse event reports

sources.description: Food safety recalls and enforcement actions

sources.description: Comprehensive guide to healthy lifestyle choices

metadata.description: Comprehensive collection of credible, open-source medical data sources including major databases, APIs, and educational content from WHO, CDC, NIH, FDA, and other authoritative medical institutions
notes: All sources are from verified, authoritative medical organizations
APIs may require registration or rate limiting
Some datasets require credentialed access (MIMIC databases)
Content is suitable for medical AI and educational applications
